attributes.action: All front line emergency services workers be prioritised for a Covid 19 vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: At the moment the Police, Fire Service, and other front line emergency workers are currently being told it’s not essential for them to be vaccinated when they are dealing with the members of the public. And most of them are working without being protected. As they are being told there not an essential to be on the priority list for the vaccine despite being emergency service front line workers.? But they should be. And something needs to be done about it.!
attributes.background: I want them to be added to the covid 19 priority key workers list for vaccinations. As they are out there dealing with members of the public for All front line emergency services from police, fire service, should be prioritised for a vaccine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564155
